channel.title: update on Joseph Liu's Portfolio and Blog
channel.description: Recent content in update on Joseph Liu's Portfolio and Blog

item.title: Fillup Status Site
item.author: joeliu3rd@icloud.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Fillup-status-app but in a browser, internet required: Your HP: 20 Roll Your coordinates: , Your abilities: Stomp Block Slide Teleport Triple Punch Your items: Lasoo Wall Mine Spear HP Bottle (Use: +5HP) To download the Android APK, go here, if you’re on PC and want to play it offine, save this page as a single file

item.title: Fillup Status App 1.2
item.author: joeliu3rd@icloud.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: This is the fourth post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, the second here, or the third To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon, but now have a browser version: thatisdrtruman.github.io/posts/fillup-status-site I now added ten checkboxes to mark in your player’s inventory. Whether you already have one of the items and/or abilities. Download Download

item.title: Fillup Status App 1.1
item.author: joeliu3rd@icloud.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: UPDATE 01/02/2024: Download now at fillup-status-app-1.2 This is the third post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, the second here To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon, but now I have a browser version: thatisdrtruman.github.io/posts/fillup-status-site I now added two EditText boxes to mark in your player’s coordinates, bolded the title and slightly condense them features together. The HP bar (the number changes as you use the slider)
